appendix.title: Detailed Changes from NISP Version 9 (I) to NISP Version 10 (J)

row.entry:
Type
Types - A: Addition; D: Deletion; U: Updated; E: Errata correction
All profiles now hyperlinked baseline documents
Updated to reference profiles using hyperlinks
103 new standards to Vol 2 of the NISP
20 new standards to Vol 3 of the NISP
Move STANAG 4559 Ed.4 from Volume 2 to Volume 3
Bluetooth 4.2;WS-I Basic Profile 1.2;Common Alerting Protocol Version 1.2;
NATO Interoperability Standards and Profiles eXchange Specification
TMForum REST Specifications TMF621 R14.4.1 V1.3.5; TMF622, R14.5.1 V2.0.1; TR250 R15.5.1 V2.0.1

OGC Web Services Common Implementation Specification, v2.0.0, 06-121r9, 2010-04-07; Corrigendum 1 for OGC Web Services Common Standard v2.0.0 â€“ Multilingual, 11-157, 2011-10-18 ;OGC Styled Layer Descriptor (SLD) Implementation Specification v1.0.0, 02-070, 2002-09-19
